source.interface:
* Interface representing a field. *
* Classes implementing this interface will often be singletons. *
* the type of the field elements FieldElement $Id: Field.java 1416643 2012-12-03 19:37:14Z tn $ 2.0
* Get the additive identity of the field. *
* The additive identity is the element e0 of the field such that * for all elements a of the field, the equalities a + e0 = * e0 + a = a hold. * additive identity of the field
* Get the multiplicative identity of the field. *
* The multiplicative identity is the element e1 of the field such that * for all elements a of the field, the equalities a × e1 = * e1 × a = a hold. * multiplicative identity of the field
<method name="getRuntimeClass" type="Class
